note.query: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM [dm].[Dim_Channel] WHERE [Create_Time]>DATEADD(DAY,-3,CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) AND (Channel_FIN IS NULL OR SubChannel_FIN IS NULL);
note.title: [Notification] New Channel_FIN, SubChannel_FIN are not assigned
note.body:
[dm].[Dim_Channel]表近三天有新增Channel没有分配 Channel_FIN,SubChannel_FIN。
可能需要如下手动处理：
note.returntable: SELECT * FROM [dm].[Dim_Channel] WHERE [Create_Time]>DATEADD(DAY,-3,CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) AND (Channel_FIN IS NULL OR SubChannel_FIN IS NULL)
